comments.creator: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.text: Bug 691647's patch removes methods from the nsISidebar interface, so SeaMonkey's implementation needs to be updated accordingly.
comments.author: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Bug 691647's patch removes methods from the nsISidebar interface, so SeaMonkey's implementation needs to be updated accordingly.

comments.text: See attachment 564444 for an example of the changes that need to be ported. It looks like suite's nsSidebar.js has other unused methods as well though (e.g. isPanel), and could benefit from further cleanup.
comments.author: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.creator: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: See attachment 564444 for an example of the changes that need to be ported. It looks like suite's nsSidebar.js has other unused methods as well though (e.g. isPanel), and could benefit from further cleanup.
Just for the record, even though I completely disagree with it, Neil wants to fork nsISidebar stuff in Bug 692731.
